item.title: About
item.description: Bio RaphaÃ«l Grasset is a technical fellow at PTC. He was previously principal engineer at PTC (Nov 2015-June 2018), staff engineer at Qualcomm Research Austria (Nov 2013- Nov 2015), senior researcher (2011-2014) at the Institute for Computer Graphics and Vision (TU-Graz, Austria) and affiliated researcher at the Human Interface Technology Laboratory New Zealand (University of Canterbury, New Zealand).
